nodes.text: The Lesser Bogwing was a reptavian native to the planet Dagobah. A type of bogwing, these small creatures lived in the swamps of the planet.
The lesser bogwing was a small reptavian native to the planet Dagobah. They walked on four, short spindly legs, and had a pair of leathery wings. Lesser bogwings had either purple or dark brown skin.

These creatures lived near the bottom of the forest, in the swamps and jungles, rarely venturing into the canopies above in fear of predators, unlike their larger cousin, the Greater Bogwing. Instead, these creatures preyed upon morp, butcherbugs, small rodents and lizards. While not very dangerous on their own, a group of lesser bogwings could prove to be a major nuisance. They had claws and teeth.
